articles.title: New launch date set for Boeing's first astronaut launch - First Coast News
articles.description: The launch was supposed to happen on Monday, but didn't because of a pressure relief valve issue. The new launch date is set for May 17.

articles.author: CGTN
articles.title: Chang'e-6 enters lunar orbit after near-moon braking - CGTN
articles.description: China's Chang'e-6 lunar probe has successfully entered its circumlunar orbit after performing a near-moon braking procedure, the China National Space Administration said on Wednesday.

articles.description: Venus once had oceans of water but today, it's bone-dry. Now, researchers know why.
articles.content:
